messages.subject: Re: [SHQ_Spy_Division] PMK Saitou Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Incredible.  It really is... beautiful!  I love your style (your Yamaguchi Jirou at Aizu is still one of my very favorites) --- simple with so much energy
messages.messageBody:
Incredible. It really is... beautiful! I love your style (your Yamaguchi Jirou at Aizu is still one of my very favorites) --- simple with so much energy coming off of it.

phil (who can't draw worth spit...)

Tiffany <tnamwong@...> wrote:
I submitted fanart to the contest Angrybee informed us about
Pic
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/PMKSH1.jpg
Title: Saitou Hajime:Bored as Usual
Media: overhead projecter marker
Note I made him left-handed just because I think historical Saitou was
left handed. The mon/kamon in the background is historical Fujita
Goro's family crest (nine bamboo leaves).

I think his head is a bit big...and he looks like he used the entire
can of hairspray...but its not like I can white it out or anything.

messages.subject: PMK Saitou Vs Rk Saitou
messages.msgSnippet: ... BUT rewatch what you have and check him out in the battle scenes....that man s look is intense and very cool.....even if he was oh so cruel to my beloved
messages.messageBody:
Tiffany wrote:

>I was thinking that it would cool if PMK Saitou was drawn with amber
>eyes...but then again he has the droopy eye look while RK Saitou's
>eyes are sooo intense.
>
>
BUT rewatch what you have and check him out in the battle scenes....that
man's look is intense and very cool.....even if he was oh so cruel to my
beloved Maro....

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Re: PMK Saitou Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Go ahead...I m sure that private use is okay...seeing how there are tons of RK wallpapers all over the internet. ***if you guys notice I put our webaddresses
messages.messageBody:
Go ahead...I'm sure that private use is okay...seeing how there are
tons of RK wallpapers all over the internet.

***if you guys notice I put our webaddresses on the pic so I probably
won't win anything (and I told them I just wanted to participate I
don't want a prize)...but if they display it somewhere we get free
advertisement.

messages.subject: Re: PMK Saitou Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, go ahead...the deadline for fanart/fanfic was today...I just emailed the link to the people in charge of the contest. I was thinking that it would cool if
messages.messageBody:
Yes, go ahead...the deadline for fanart/fanfic was today...I just
emailed the link to the people in charge of the contest.

I was thinking that it would cool if PMK Saitou was drawn with amber
eyes...but then again he has the droopy eye look while RK Saitou's
eyes are sooo intense.

<bsher213@b...> wrote:

messages.subject: Re: PMK Saitou Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: I LOVE IT! Hey... So this is your gift ne? :O) I m not sure about the laws about this but do you think I can use it on my desktop at work? Can I use it after
messages.messageBody:
I LOVE IT! Hey... So this is your gift ne? :O)
I'm not sure about the laws about this but do you think I can use it
on my desktop at work? Can I use it after the contest (or earlier if
possible)...

Last month my pic was all the real faces of the members of the
Shinsengumi and people including my boss kept stopping by asking who
they were... Then I'd go on a long explanation.. Basically giving
them a history lesson. The good thing about it is that they seem to
appreciate the lesson...

This pic could make a good conversational piece about the SHQ group
too... Let me know! ^_^

messages.subject: PMK Saitou Fanart
messages.msgSnippet: I submitted fanart to the contest Angrybee informed us about Pic http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/PMKSH1.jpg Title: Saitou Hajime:Bored as Usual Media: overhead
messages.messageBody:
I submitted fanart to the contest Angrybee informed us about
Pic
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/PMKSH1.jpg
Title: Saitou Hajime:Bored as Usual
Media: overhead projecter marker
Note I made him left-handed just because I think historical Saitou was
left handed. The mon/kamon in the background is historical Fujita
Goro's family crest (nine bamboo leaves).

I think his head is a bit big...and he looks like he used the entire
can of hairspray...but its not like I can white it out or anything.
